DOC.brief_summary: To determine sensitivity specificity urinary NGF , PGE2 , IL-6 , EGF combination diagnose different urodynamic diagnosis .
DOC.brief_title: Studies Biomarkers Female Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Abstract Background/Purpose : Urodyamic study objective method evaluate female patient low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) . However , method include place urinary catheter , thus prevents routine method evaluate follow patient LUTS . Therefore , necessary find simple objective method help evaluate female patient LUTS . Several kind biomarker report diagnosing patient overactive bladder ; however , sensitivity remain poor . The aim study find useful biomarker , biomarkers , combination , aid urodynamic study , objectively precisely evaluate female patient LUTS . Patients Methods : We perform prospective study recruit 300 female patient LUTS outpatient clinic Department Obstetrics Gynecology National Taiwan University Hospital Far Eastern Memorial Hospital . All patient ask complete OABSS , UDI-6 & IIQ-7 questionnaire , void diary , 20-min pad test urodynamic study . Urinary nerve growth factor , prostaglandin E2 , interleukin-6 epidermal growth factor also measure . Besides , also recruit 30 female patient without LUTS outpatient clinic , ask complete questionnaire examination except pad test urodynamic study . Possible Results : With comparison parameter non-LUTS LUTS patient , answer question ( 1 ) mean value urinary NGF , PGE2 , IL-6 , EGF different urodynamic study , ( 2 ) sensitivity specificity urinary NGF , PGE2 , IL-6 , EGF combination diagnose different urodynamic diagnosis .
DOC.criteria: Female patient low urinary tract symptom acute cystitis
